title: Cant log in long authenticating and then an error occurs

replies.body: What does the error say exactly?  Is it invalid credentials or a time out?  If it's a time out then you may want to try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as something is likely blocking your network from reaching the server.

I have the same problem - but only on one of my computers (laptop). I can't find any significant differences, my stationary pc works fine, but I'm not super tech savvy, so it might be something I'm not seeing.
